before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ojdj","text":"1. Confirm the SDS (Safety Data Sheet) for safety warnings and hazards for all reagents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afffg","text":"2. Use fumehood when working with phenol:chloroform:isoamylalcohol (PCI) and chloroform:isoamylalcohol (CI).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m2ge","text":"3. Follow PCI and CI disposal instruction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bfrc","text":"4. Use gloves during RNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26rqk","text":"5. Wipe equipments with 70% ethanol or RNAse removal spray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"34slv","text":"This is a protocol for leaf sampling of S. palustris in natural habitats as well as RNA extraction method using CTAB+PVP buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enq3n","text":"The extraction will require 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4u488","text":"REAGENTS (the brands are the ones were used, but can be replaced with other brands)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":83}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"867fk","text":"1. 2% CTAB Extraction buffer containing 4% PVP (1 Liter) - store at room temperature (RT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v4as","text":"    1 M Tris-HCl (pH 8.0)                 100 ml (100 mM) ; Fujifilm Wako, 015-20093 (1 kg) or Fujifilm Wako, 019-20091 (100 g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mc1m","text":"    0.5  M EDTA (pH 8.0)                  40 ml (20 mM) ; Nippongene, 311-90075","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8et3j","text":"    NaCl                                             71.9 g (1.4 M) ; Fujifilm Wako, 191-01665","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12g64","text":"    Add MilliQ water up to 1 liter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4oetv","text":"    Autoclave 120°C, 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sna7","text":"    When still warm, add following CTAB and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6q74","text":"    CTAB (Hexadecyltrimethyl-ammonium bromide)    20 g    ; Fujifilm Wako, 030-02105","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qc1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19mcs","text":"    Add PVP fresh before each use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jkqg","text":"    Polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP MW 4.0)                                      40 g　; Sigma Aldrich, 9003-39-8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6marf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15ba1","text":"2. Chloroform・isoamylalcohol (24:1) , store in 4°C (Chloroform: Fujifilm Wako, 67-66-3; isoamylalcohol : Fujifilm Wako, 133-12011)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5be7r","text":"    Add 20.8 mL isoamylalcohol to newly opened 500 ml chloroform. No need to autoclave","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qhbb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a34il","text":"3. Phenol:chloroform:isoamylalcohol (250 ml), store in 4°C ; Nippongene 311-90151","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3je6t","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9t4cb","text":"4. DNAse-RNAse-free water for molecular biology, store in RT (not DEPC-treated water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7u0m","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rh1v","text":"5. 8M LiCl solution, store in RT ; Fujifilm Wako, 129-05243","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvbmi","text":"    Note: Add 24.16 g lithium chloride slowly to 50 mL water. LiCl releases heat when dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fpm","text":"    Autoclave             121°C, 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e31c1","text":"6. 80% ethanol, store in -30°C; Wako, 057-00456","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93k5d","text":"    add 40 ml 99.5% ethanol to 10 ml molecular grade water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38gdf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rtq7","text":"7.  3M NaOAc solution (pH 5.2), store in RT ; Nippongene, 316-90081","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjnsk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iq8o","text":"8.  99.5% ethanol, store in -30°C ; Wako, 057-00456","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2irdt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"199vc","text":"9.  DNase I (RNase free), store in -30°C ; Nippongene, 314-08071","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bpu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9aft","text":"10. Recombinant RNase Inhibitor ver.2.0, store in -30°C; Takara, 2315A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lclh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ho4g","text":"11.  Mortar, pestle, spatula (clean with  70% ethanol or RNase Knockout (Fujifilm Wako, 181-03381) or other RNAse removal spray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo2mi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pceb","text":"12. RNAlater stabilization solution, store in RT ; Invitrogen, AM7020","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"fb6l2","text":"1. Kiss, T., Karácsony, Z., Gomba-Tóth, A. et al. A modified CTAB method for the extraction of high-quality RNA from mono-and dicotyledonous plants rich in secondary metabolites.Plant Methods 20, 62 (2024). https://doi.org/10.1186/s13007-024-01198-z","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":43,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":178,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":192,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3i1q9","text":"Prepare RNAlater solution in 50 ml falcon tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tuat","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"4198213B341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"RNAlater","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"AM7020","stats":{"total_protocols":7},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80iuq","text":"Choose young leaves without fiber. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k2c1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9gs4c","text":"Cut leaves into small pieces into the RNAlater solution. Proportion of leaves and RNAlater solution should be maximum 1:5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62l76","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj0bu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"buf0b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"alt":"","guid":"4DACC95F820411EF86340A58A9FEAC02","height":299.1618181818182,"id":503816,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_9104.jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rm9s9ape.jpeg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnai9ape.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnah9ape.webp","width":224.47339699863574}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"alt":"","guid":"ACE43F3F81FF11EFB4F80A58A9FEAC02","height":205.82363636363652,"id":503818,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"8i8ko\",\"text\":\"Amount of leaves in RNAlater solution\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_9512.jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rm9j9ape.jpeg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnak9ape.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnaj9ape.webp","width":154.43792633015016}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"lghh","text":"Store 50 ml tubes inside ice box/ice packs for shipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u1jf","text":"Leaves in RNAlater storage can be stored at 4°C up to 1 month. After that, leaves will show reddish color. It is difficult to extract RNA from reddish color leaves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ndsh","text":"Warm CTAB extraction buffer to 65°C (in water bath or beaker with warm water).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3igm","text":" Add leaf materials into mortar. Wipe RNAlater left on leaves using kimwipe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v22q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10hsb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"vk77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"right","alt":"","guid":"E5E24E8E81FF11EF86340A58A9FEAC02","height":210.1399999999999,"id":503820,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"6hs35\",\"text\":\"The amount of leaves from the 50 ml tubes. 6 ml extraction buffer or more will be enough for the leaves.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_9513.jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rm9m9ape.jpeg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnan9ape.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/rnam9ape.webp","width":157.67667121418825}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tpa8","text":"Add liquid nitrogen to mortar. Quickly crush plant material to fine powder. Keep adding liquid nitrogen while crushing, to keep plant material frozen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqjgi","text":"Add 1 spatula of sample powder to 1 ml warm CTAB buffer in 2 ml tubes. Vortex to mix the material and buffer, make sure no clumps. Add more CTAB buffer if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1bbng","text":"Add 700 µL chloroform:isoamylalcohol (24:1). Vortex to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tubf","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 rpm, 10 min, 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76uct","text":"Repeat step 9-11  twice (total 3 times). At this stage the upper phase should be greenish-clear color.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ab97q","text":"Add 500 µL of 8 M LiCl, mix by inverting tubes several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l9jm","text":"Prepare ice in a styrofoam box. Put tubes in ice and store overnight at 4℃ (ideally 12-15 hours, before solution turns red)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej8ej","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 rpm, 45 min, 4℃. (Thaw DNAseI buffer while waiting).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1hpm","text":"White-transparent pellet should appear at bottom. Discard supernatant using pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5pm6g","text":"Add 80% cold ethanol 50 µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3r1rc","text":"Centrifuge 15,000 rpm, 5 min, 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3fnfo","text":"Discard 80% ethanol by pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gl5r","text":"Dissolve pellet in 270 µL DNase-RNAse free water. Pellet from 6 tubes can be combined into 1 tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drbjs","text":"Add 27 µL of 10×DNase I buffer to solution. Add also 2 µL of DNase I (RNase free) and 1 µL of RNase inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"44jed","text":"Incubate at 37℃、30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edgb9","text":"Add 300 µl of phenol:chloroform:isoamylalcohol (25:24:1), invert tubes to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2o6gr","text":"Centrifuge 15,000 rpm, 3 min, 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pqpa","text":"Transfer supernatant to new 1.5 ml tube, add 300 µL of chloroform:isoamylalcohol invert tubes to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ldmr","text":"Centrifuge 15,000 rpm, 3 min, 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vmi1","text":"Transfer supernatant to new 1.5 ml tube, 30 µL of 3M NaOAc and 700 µl of 99.5% ethanol (4°C), mix well by inverting tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ln3k","text":"Store in -30℃, overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ejbfb","text":"Centrifuge 15,000 rpm, 45 min, 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar2uu","text":"Discard supernatant using pipette. White-transparent pellet should appear at the bottom of tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aeirh","text":"Add 100 µL of 80％ ethanol (4℃),","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7brf2","text":"Centrifuge 15,000 rpm, 3 min, 4℃ . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ud3c","text":"Add 50 µL of water to dissolve pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6qhlj","text":"Quantify with Nanodrop and check quality using gel electrophoresis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4uf45","text":"Store RNA at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f9ddc","text":"Transfer upper phase to new 1.5 ml tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7lav0","text":"Discard solution using pipette, open tubes on ice to dry pellet (a few minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: S. palustris leaves sampling and RNA extraction
title_html: S. palustris leaves sampling and RNA extraction

versions.title: S. palustris leaves sampling and RNA extraction
